**Laboratory and Scientific Equipment - Cytometer for Guelph Research and Development Centre**
===========================================================

**Reference Number:** cb-9304-72069430
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** 01B46-23-133
**Publication Date:** September 20, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 30, 2023 2:00 PM ET
**Expected Contract Start Date:** October 9, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** March 1, 2024
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Procurement Details:**
-------------------------

This procurement is for the supply and installation of a laboratory and scientific equipment - cytometer for the Guelph Research and Development Centre. The contractor is expected to meet all mandatory technical requirements for the duration of the contract.

**Technical Evaluation Criteria:**
-----------------------------------

The following technical evaluation criteria are mandatory and must be met:

* [M1] Compliance with CSA-approved electronic connections
* [M2] Flow cytometer for cellular and multi-parameter analysis
* [M3] Benchtop, modular design with expansion capacity for lasers and detectors
* [M4] Upgradeable and configurable to meet evolving research needs
* [M5] High-throughput screening capabilities in plate formats (including 96-well plates)
* [M6] Capable of conducting antibody and phenotyping screening and cell signaling studies
* [M7] Ability to conduct cell cycle analysis
* [M8] Capable of detecting rare events
* [M9] Ability to conduct stem cell analysis, cancer, and apoptosis studies
* [M10] Capable of performing Cytometric Bead Array (CBA) assays with a minimum of 15 unique beads
* [M11] High-throughput capabilities with at least four lasers and 16 parameters of detection
* [M12] Electronic speed of up to 65,000 events/sec
